title: Real-Time Language Translator
description: Built a web-based system for real-time language translation, focusing on low-latency text processing and clean user interaction. The project involved integrating backend logic with a responsive frontend to handle continuous input and output reliably.

title: Neural Eye
description: Developed an AI-based monitoring system to detect and track endangered species using computer vision. The project focused on model inference, detection accuracy, and system-level thinking rather than dataset size or UI polish.

title: Notes App
description: Implemented a lightweight notes management application in Java with emphasis on data handling, structure, and core application logic. The project strengthened understanding of object-oriented design and application flow.
